# Citation Info

To cite this book, please use the following information:

<!-- FIXME: make dynamic after https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/discussions/1072 -->
```
@misc{
  title = {mlr3book},
  author = {Marc Becker, Martin Binder, Bernd Bischl, Natalie Foss, Lars Kotthoff, Michel Lan, Florian Pfisterer, Nicholas G. Reich, Jakob Richter, Patrick Schratz, Raphael Sonabend, Damir Pulatov}
  url = {https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com},
  year = {2022},
  month = {09},
  day = {14},
}
```

To reference the [mlr3](https://mlr3.mlr-org.com) R package, please cite our JOSS paper:



::: {.cell hash='citation_cache/pdf/citation-001_d74834fa095e2afddd74d7011563f060'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
@Article{mlr3,
  title = {{mlr3}: A modern object-oriented machine learning framework in {R}},
  author = {Michel Lang and Martin Binder and Jakob Richter and Patrick Schratz and Florian Pfisterer and Stefan Coors and Quay Au and Giuseppe Casalicchio and Lars Kotthoff and Bernd Bischl},
  journal = {Journal of Open Source Software},
  year = {2019},
  month = {dec},
  doi = {10.21105/joss.01903},
  url = {https://joss.theoj.org/papers/10.21105/joss.01903},
}
```
:::
:::
